com.google.appinventor.components.scripts

Class ExternalComponentGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.scripts.ExternalComponentGenerator

  • public class ExternalComponentGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Tool to generate component.json for extension.
    Author:
    mouha.oumar@gmail.com (Mouhamadou O. Sall)

      Returns true if a class is related to an external component Current implementation returns true for all files in the same package as that of the external component A better implementation is possible but might be more complex
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      The definitions of the arguments used by this script args[0]: the path to simple_component.json args[1]: the path to simple_component_build_info.json args[2]: the path to ExternalComponentAsset.dir: "${local.build.dir}/ExternalComponents" args[3]: the path to "${AndroidRuntime-class.dir}" args[4]: the path to /build/classes/BuildServer/files args[5]: the path to external componentsTemp directory

      • copyFile

        private static java.lang.Boolean copyFile(java.lang.String srcPath,
                                          java.lang.String dstPath)
        Copy one file to another. If destination file does not exist, it is created.
        Parameters:
        srcPath - absolute path to source file
        dstPath - absolute path to destination file
        Returns:
        true if the copy succeeds, false otherwise

      • copyRelatedExternalClasses

        private static void copyRelatedExternalClasses(java.lang.String srcPath,
                                               java.lang.String componentType,
                                               java.lang.String destPath)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Copy a compiled classes related to a given extension in his package folder
        Parameters:
        srcPath - the folder in which to check compiled classes
        componentType - the classpath of the extension
        destPath - where the compiled classes will be copied
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • isRelatedExternalClass

        private static boolean isRelatedExternalClass(java.lang.String testClassAbsolutePath,
                                              java.lang.String externalComponentType)
        Returns true if a class is related to an external component Current implementation returns true for all files in the same package as that of the external component A better implementation is possible but might be more complex
        Parameters:
        testClassAbsolutePath - absolute path of the class file
        externalComponentType - classpath of the external component
        Returns:
